name: One Shot (Noxids)
description:
In One shot you have one bullet that you must use beat each stage. The problem is, ounce you throw it, you have to pick it up again. Can you find the treasure? Featuring a upgrade tree that lets you customise your bullet.  Due to time restraints there are quite a few bugs, sorry about that... Limited levels. 

Controls  

WASD to move 

Space to Jump 

Hold Left Click (fire) 

Right Click (dash)
